 MAJID JUMA KHAMIS HAMID AL -BADRI  
 
  2  
Employment record:  
 
Mezoon International Travel & Tours LLC (Muscat ) 
 
Accounts Assistant  
(Mar ’14 – Present)  
 
Responsibilities:  
 
Ø Invoice all sales transactions.  
Ø Verify all records are accurate.  
Ø Ensure the invoices have been delivered to clients on time with 
proper documentation.  
Ø To cross check all unreported sales.  
Ø To make a fortnightly report on unreported sales and report to 
Finance Manag er. 
Ø Proper filing of all documentation along with respective invoices.
